citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:50pm on April 25,
2023. Contact was attempted at the facility and inspector was informed licensee was not expected to be at the facility for
several hours. The listed phone number was called, and a message was left.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:50pm on April 25, 
2023. Contact was attempted at the facility and inspector was informed licensee was not expected to be at the facility for 
several hours. The listed phone number was called, and a message was left. 
 
 
 
End Section
